title: 服务器里死亡后BACK回去有时会掉线的问题
author: wjtcc
txt_content:
不需要大家分析插件MOD兼容性等原因，只求在不删插件和MOD的基础上给出一个可行的解决方案。

这是某个玩家掉线时候的后台代码 其他人的和他差不多 

2013-03-23 13:10:25 [WARNING] Failed to handle packet for KIVJ/49.86.19.47: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to add player. iq['KIVJ'/4, l='world', x=468.41, y=77.88, z=28.47](KIVJ at 468.41142221353033,77.875,28.46813391267653) already is in chunk 29, 1
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to add player. iq['KIVJ'/4, l='world', x=468.41, y=77.88, z=28.47](KIVJ at 468.41142221353033,77.875,28.46813391267653) already is in chunk 29, 1

 at ik.a(PlayerManager.java:175)
 at gm.moveToWorld(ServerConfigurationManager.java:657)
 at gm.a(ServerConfigurationManager.java:563)
 at iv.a(NetServerHandler.java:1623)

 at iw.b(NetworkListenThread.java:57)
 at ht.b(DedicatedServerListenThread.java:34)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.r(MinecraftServer.java:981)

 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.q(MinecraftServer.java:857)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:744)
 at fy.run(ThreadMinecraftServer.java:16)

还有一个是家具MOD的问题，下面是出错代码，

replies.author: 2B国国主
replies.txt_content: 是不是服务器装了nospawnchunks  导致back回去以后因为nospawnchunks卸除区块又重复加载区块造成的区块加载错误？

replies.author: wjtcc
replies.txt_content:
2B国国主 发表于 2013-3-24 05:22 
是不是服务器装了nospawnchunks  导致back回去以后因为nospawnchunks卸除区块又重复加载区块造成的区块加载 ...
没这个插件
